destinations.title: Discover Sri Lanka
destinations.description: Explore the pearl of the Indian Ocean - from ancient kingdoms and sacred temples to misty mountains, wildlife reserves, and pristine beaches.

sigiriya.title: Sigiriya & Dambulla
sigiriya.description: Iconic Lion Rock fortress with ancient frescoes, 1st century BC cave temples with 150+ Buddha statues.

kandy.title: Kandy - Cultural Capital
kandy.description: Sacred Temple of the Tooth, Royal Botanical Gardens, colonial architecture, traditional Kandyan dance.

nuwaraEliya.title: Nuwara Eliya - Little England
nuwaraEliya.description: Cool climate hill station, tea plantations and factories, Horton Plains World's End, Victorian architecture.

ancientCities.title: Ancient Cities
ancientCities.description: Anuradhapura and Polonnaruwa UNESCO sites, 2,250-year-old sacred Bo tree, ancient stupas and palaces.

ella.title: Ella & Hill Country
ella.description: Scenic train journeys through tea estates, Little Adam's Peak trek, Nine Arch Bridge, mountain views.

wildlife.title: Wildlife & National Parks
wildlife.description: Yala leopard safari, Wilpattu elephants, Udawalawe wildlife, Sinharaja rainforest, whale watching.

ramayana.title: Ramayana Trail
ramayana.description: Sacred Hindu temples: Munneswaram, Koneshwaram, Seetha Amman, Bhakta Hanuman with spiritual significance.

southern.title: Southern Coast
southern.description: Historic Galle Fort, Unawatuna and Mirissa beaches, turtle hatcheries, Madu River mangroves, water sports.

trincomalee.title: Trincomalee & East Coast
trincomalee.description: Ancient Koneshwaram Temple, pristine beaches, Pigeon Island, snorkeling, diving, less-crowded coastal paradise.

packages.title: Curated Tour Packages
packages.description: Expertly crafted journeys that showcase Sri Lanka's finest destinations, cultural heritage, and natural wonders.

services.title: White-Glove Services
services.description: From inspiration to return, we handle every detail.

tailored.title: Tailor-Made Itineraries
tailored.description: Designed around your pace and passions.

stays.title: Handpicked Stays
stays.description: Luxury hotels, villas, and private retreats.

concierge.title: Concierge Support
concierge.description: VIP transfers, experiences, and on-trip care.

about.title: Your Journey, Perfected
about.description1: Having started operation in the hospitality industry with the opening of Lavish Eco Jungle in 2018, and setting a high standard earning a certificate of excellence from Booking.com, we decided to expand our service to include inbound tours.
about.description2: Lavish Travel and Tours aims to provide the same high standard of service to make your visit to Sri Lanka a truly memorable one.

contact.title: Ready for your Sri Lanka escape?
contact.description: Tell us your Sri Lanka dream — we'll handle the rest.
